pageContext.claim: “Blue-collar jobs have grown at their fastest pace in more than 30 years. And we've added half a million manufacturing jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear how Trump defines "blue-collar jobs." Manufacturing jobs have increased by 450,000 since he took office, according to data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics. But this trend is not new. These jobs have been growing steadily since the end of the Great Recession.
